author: Alice Goodman
title: All Christians doubt, but scandals are testing my faith in the Church
text:
Oh Lord. Just as I was sitting down to write something about the 1,700th anniversary of the Nicene Creed, this happens. Another scandal, another all-too-credible account of abuse in the Church of England, yet another story suppressed for the sake of the reputation of the institution. By the time this column is printed, that scandal will have been succeeded by a new one; each changing place with that which goes before. I wouldn’t say that Jeffrey John’s prayer for the church from 2001 has supplanted the Lord’s Prayer in the top 10 Prayers Most Prayed, but it must be getting close:
Lord, do something about your Church.
It is so awful; it is hard not to feel ashamed of belonging to it.
Most of the time it seems to be all the things you condemned:
hierarchical, conventional, judgemental, hypocritical,
respectable, comfortable, moralising, compromising,
clinging to its privileges and worldly securities,
and when not positively objectionable, merely absurd…
Every Sunday in church we stand, look to the east, towards Jerusalem, and say the Nicene Creed. Every single week we say in one voice what we believe about God, about Jesus, about creation and redemption and the Holy Spirit, and about what will ultimately become of each one of us.
When the service is Common Worship, we begin the creed with the words, “We believe in one God…” It’s “I believe…” at the earlier service. If you’re at a sung mass and hear it in Latin, it begins Credo in unum Deum. I believe. That “I” is a corporate “I”, the voice of the Church for the last 1,700 years. It’s okay: you can still come to church and receive the sacraments if you’re not certain you, personally, believe every word. When you stand up and speak, you’re joining with the body who has proclaimed this creed through the ages. What is belief except holding on, trusting things we can’t prove? The creed doesn’t require us to believe that everything in the Bible is historically verifiable, nor that since Adam’s fall all humanity is subject to God’s wrath and condemnation. It does ask us to say we believe that Jesus is completely human and completely God, the original theological victory that led to the creation of the creed. And even this bedrock assertion invites wonder as soon as it is made.
This is just as well, because people have always had doubts and strange notions. Even theologians have doubts and strange notions. Out in the parishes, very few people, for instance, seem to believe in the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come. The resurrection of the dead? What would that entail? Imagine a parish visit. I am having tea with two children, their mother and the cat. “They wonder whether Jesus might have been in a coma, or unconscious, and came round in the tomb,” their mother tells me. “Many people have wondered that over the centuries,” I begin, and then try to talk about how different the dead are from the living; how very, very different when you see them and touch them. We talk about how the disciples thought they were seeing a ghost, and Jesus asking for something to eat to prove he wasn’t. In the end, we decide, it’s a mystery, like so many things in the universe.
Some people tend towards materialism, some towards spiritualism. Most people in my parishes want to be buried next to their kin, not so that they will all rise together when time shall be no more, but so that their bodies will repose forever in the same chalk and clay. Some believe in reincarnation. Some believe that we are entirely spirit. The church fends off heresy with the creed and the people go out with their own beliefs. Did God create everything? Even wasps? Is everything that happens God’s will? How does that work then? Doing theology on the hoof is a lot more exciting for me than doing it in the university. And yet if I hadn’t spent a lot of time in the university, could I manage to visit and preach in these parishes? I’m thinking now of the student in a seminar who said, outraged, “I can’t go back to my people and tell them that the resurrection is just a symbol!” “What do you mean, ‘just a symbol?”’ retorted the professor, a Missionary Oblate of Mary Immaculate. “Symbols are all we have. Symbols are what we are. Christ is the symbol of God. We are the symbols of Christ.” Which brings me back to Jeffrey John’s prayer, which goes on:
Lord, we need you to overturn the tables, judge us and cleanse us,
challenge and change us,
break and remake us.
Help us to be what you called us to be.
Help us to embody you on earth.
Help us to make you real down here,
and to feed your people bread instead of stones.
And start with me.

author: Amaris Encinas
title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard shares first selfie after release from prison
text: Gypsy Rose Blanchard commemorated her first full day of freedom with a selfie. She took to Instagram Friday to mark her release from prison by snapping a quick pic of her smiling, writing “First selfie of freedom!” in the caption. Blanchard, who conspired with her then-boyfriend Nick Godejohn to kill her abusive mother in 2015 , was released from prison early Thursday morning. She pled guilty to a second-degree murder charge on Tuesday, July 5, 2016 and served about 85% of her 10-year sentence, spending a total of eight years behind bars for her role in the murder. She became eligible for parole in September. Blanchard also recently announced the release of an eBook titled “Release,” set to come out on Jan. 9. Here’s what we know about Gypsy Rose Blanchard. Gypsy Rose Blanchard coverage: Gypsy Rose Blanchard's release from prison latest twist in shocking Munchausen by Proxy case Gypsy Rose Blanchard , who is Clauddine “Dee Dee” Blanchard’s daughter, was made to believe she suffered from a wide range of medical ailments including leukemia, asthma and muscular dystrophy thanks to her mother. Gypsy’s late mother was accused of having made her daughter appear to have a range of physical and developmental ailments, USA Today previously reported. Dee Dee Blanchard, later said to have Munchausen syndrome by proxy which is a mental condition in which someone makes another person ill for sympathy or gain received disability payments and gifts from charities all of Gypsy’s illnesses, that often led to painful treatment and procedures. Gypsy, who used a wheelchair before it was discovered she could walk , said she was desperate to escape her mother's abuse and sought help from her online boyfriend, Nicholas Godejohn. Godejohn, who was was sentenced to life in prison for stabbing and killing Dee Dee Blanchard, traveled to Missouri on June 9, 2015 to help enact the escape plan. He was reportedly let into the home after Gypsy’s late mother fell asleep and used a knife handed to him by Gypsy to stab the sleeping woman 17 times, killing her before fleeing to his native Wisconsin, USA Today previously reported. Gypsy later told ABC 20/20 news she hid in the bathroom with hands over her ears during the act. Authorities were contacted about a post on Dee Dee Blanchard’s Facebook page dated June 14, 2015 that read, ‘That B*** is dead!’ before her body was found in her home with multiple stab wounds. Before Gypsy was publicly tied to the murder, many Springfield residents were worried that she was also in peril. The bizarre nature of the Springfield murder made national headlines and became the subject of documentaries and streamed television series . Gypsy and her boyfriend were arrested on June 14, 2015 in Big Bend, Wisconsin. The pair posted two updates on Dee Dee Blanchard’s Facebook page earlier that day to draw attention to her yet undiscovered body. Gypsy Rose Blanchard was born July 29, 1991, making her 32 years old in 2023. Dee Dee Blanchard was born May 3, 1967, making her 48 years old when she was killed in 2015. Gypsy married Ryan Scott Anderson in July 2022. Anderson is 37-year-old teacher based in Lake Charles, Louisiana, according to “ People .” The pair split after three months of marriage but eventually reconciled, the magazine reported. She shared with various news outlets that she planned on attending a Kansas City Chiefs game with her husband after her release, stating that she hopes she gets to meet superstar Taylor Swift, who is dating Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, USA Today previously reported.

author: Michelle Toole
title: Man whose hand was crushed by meat grinder becomes first person to get 3D-printed bionic fingers
text:
In a world where technology continually pushes boundaries, some stories stand out as true testaments to human resilience and
innovation. One such tale revolves around Mo Ali, a man whose life took a dramatic turn after a childhood accident left him with four amputated fingers. But this isn’t just a story of loss; it’s a journey of transformation and triumph.
Mo Ali’s childhood was marred by a harrowing incident in the kitchen—a moment that would change the course of his life forever. A simple task gone awry, and his hand became ensnared in the unforgiving grip of a meat grinder. The aftermath was devastating—four of his fingers lost to the unforgiving blades. Yet, amidst the pain and struggle, Mo’s spirit remained unbroken.
As Mo navigated through life, he encountered challenges that extended far beyond the physical realm. Bullying and social stigma became unwelcome companions, casting shadows over his journey. Simple joys like cycling, once cherished, became distant dreams, shackled by the limitations imposed by his injury.
But every dark cloud has a silver lining, and for Mo, that silver lining came in the form of cutting-edge technology—the ‘Hero Gauntlet’. Crafted with precision and innovation by Open Bionics, this 3D-printed marvel promised to rewrite Mo’s story. With bionic fingers at his command, Mo embarked on a journey of rediscovery—one that would reshape his life in ways he never imagined.
The Accident and Its Aftermath
Mo Ali’s life took a fateful turn during a seemingly mundane moment in his childhood—a kitchen mishap that would leave an indelible mark on his journey. As he innocently maneuvered around the kitchen, his hand met with the unforgiving blades of a meat grinder, trapping him in a moment of sheer terror. The outcome was devastating—four of his fingers severed, altering the trajectory of his life forever.
The aftermath of the accident was not just confined to physical scars; it unleashed a cascade of challenges that tested Mo’s resilience to its core. Beyond the pain of his injuries, Mo found himself navigating a landscape fraught with emotional turmoil and social stigma. Bullied for his altered appearance, he grappled with the harsh realities of discrimination, a burden no child should bear.
Yet, perhaps the cruelest blow came in the form of shattered dreams and dashed aspirations. Simple pleasures like cycling, once a source of joy and freedom, became distant memories, eclipsed by the limitations imposed by his injury. The loss of dexterity rendered everyday tasks a Herculean feat, casting a shadow over Mo’s once vibrant spirit.
In the face of adversity, Mo’s journey serves as a poignant reminder of the resilience of the human spirit. Despite the obstacles stacked against him, he refused to succumb to despair, clinging to the flicker of hope that burned within him. His story is a testament to the power of perseverance, a beacon of inspiration for anyone grappling with life’s adversities.
Introducing the Hero Gauntlet
In the realm of modern marvels, the ‘
Hero Gauntlet‘ emerges as a beacon of innovation—a testament to the boundless possibilities of technology in reshaping lives. Crafted with precision and compassion by the pioneering minds at Open Bionics, this high-tech prosthetic hand stands at the forefront of a new era in assistive technology.
Designed specifically for individuals with partial hand amputations, the Hero Gauntlet represents a paradigm shift in prosthetic innovation. Unlike traditional solutions that often fall short in functionality and comfort, this revolutionary device is purpose-built to seamlessly integrate into the lives of its users, offering a level of versatility and precision previously unimaginable.
What sets the Hero Gauntlet apart is not just its advanced engineering but its unwavering commitment to enhancing the quality of life for those it serves. Equipped with an array of cutting-edge features, including intricate sensors and intuitive controls, this bionic marvel empowers users with newfound dexterity and freedom. Whether it’s grasping a delicate object or maneuvering through daily tasks with ease, the Hero Gauntlet adapts effortlessly to the unique needs of each individual, restoring a sense of agency and independence.
But perhaps the true brilliance of the Hero Gauntlet lies in its ability to transcend the realm of mere functionality, offering a glimpse into a future where assistive technology seamlessly integrates into everyday life. More than just a prosthetic hand, it becomes a symbol of empowerment—a tangible reminder that limitations are meant to be overcome, not defined by.
As we delve deeper into the intricate design and capabilities of the Hero Gauntlet, prepare to be captivated by the sheer ingenuity and compassion that went into its creation. Join us on a journey through the heart of innovation as we unravel the mysteries of this extraordinary device and discover the transformative power it holds for individuals like Mo Ali.
Regaining Dexterity and Confidence
With the arrival of the Hero Gauntlet, Mo Ali’s world underwent a profound transformation—one marked by newfound possibilities and boundless potential. As he slipped his hand into the sleek contours of the prosthetic, he embarked on a journey of rediscovery, reclaiming the dexterity that had eluded him for so long.
The Hero Gauntlet became more than just a mechanical marvel; it became Mo’s trusted companion—a gateway to a life unburdened by the limitations of his past. With each movement, he felt the surge of power coursing through his veins, restoring a sense of agency and control that had long been absent from his life. Simple tasks that once seemed insurmountable now yielded effortlessly to his touch, a testament to the precision and adaptability of this remarkable device.
Yet, the impact of the Hero Gauntlet extended far beyond the realm of physical functionality. It served as a catalyst for a profound emotional journey—one that would ultimately redefine Mo’s sense of self and belonging. No longer shackled by the constraints of his disability, he found himself standing taller, his gaze unflinching in the face of adversity.
The prosthetic became more than just an extension of Mo’s hand; it became a mirror reflecting his inner strength and resilience. With each passing day, his confidence blossomed, emboldened by the knowledge that he was no longer defined by his limitations but empowered by his abilities. The once-hidden scars of his past began to fade, replaced by a newfound sense of pride and acceptance.
As Mo navigated through life with his newfound companion by his side, he became a living testament to the transformative power of technology and the human spirit. His story serves as a beacon of hope for countless others grappling with their own challenges, a reminder that with determination and innovation, anything is possible. In the embrace of the Hero Gauntlet, Mo found not just a prosthetic hand but a lifeline—a symbol of resilience, courage, and unwavering determination.
Overcoming Obstacles
Mo Ali’s journey towards regaining control over his life was not without its hurdles. Prior to discovering the Hero Gauntlet, Mo had experienced firsthand the limitations of traditional prosthetic solutions, including a prosthetic provided by the National Health Service (NHS) that failed to meet his needs.
The NHS prosthetic, cumbersome and uncomfortable, proved to be more of a hindrance than a help. Operated by Mo’s shoulder, its heavy frame and lack of adaptability left him feeling frustrated and disillusioned. Within a day, Mo abandoned the prosthetic, preferring to navigate the world with his own two hands rather than struggle with a device that only served to remind him of his limitations.
However, the arrival of the Hero Gauntlet heralded a new chapter in Mo’s journey—one defined by hope and possibility. Unlike its predecessors, the Hero Gauntlet was a revelation—a seamless fusion of form and function that exceeded Mo’s wildest expectations. Gone were the days of discomfort and frustration; in their place stood a prosthetic hand that felt like a natural extension of Mo’s own body.
Mo’s testimonial speaks volumes about the transformative impact of the Hero Gauntlet on his life. With a sense of awe and gratitude, he recounts how the prosthetic has revolutionized his day-to-day existence, offering unparalleled comfort and practicality. No longer burdened by the weight of his disability, Mo navigates the world with newfound ease, empowered by a prosthetic hand that moves with him, not against him.
In contrast to his previous experiences, the Hero Gauntlet represents a beacon of innovation and progress—a testament to the power of technology to transcend limitations and unlock new possibilities. As Mo continues to embrace life with unwavering determination, his story serves as a reminder that obstacles are meant to be overcome, not defined by. With the Hero Gauntlet by his side, Mo Ali stands ready to conquer whatever challenges lie ahead, a living testament to the resilience of the human spirit.
Inspiring Others and Future Outlook
Mo Ali’s journey from adversity to empowerment is not just a personal triumph; it’s a beacon of hope for countless individuals grappling with their own challenges. As Mo navigated the twists and turns of his remarkable journey, he emerged not only as a survivor but as a passionate advocate for disability acceptance and empowerment.
Driven by his own experiences, Mo found himself on a mission to shatter stereotypes and challenge societal perceptions surrounding disability. With unwavering courage and determination, he stepped into the spotlight, using his voice to champion inclusivity and foster a culture of empathy and understanding.
Through his advocacy work, Mo has touched the lives of countless individuals, offering solace and support to those who may feel marginalized or unseen. By sharing his story with unflinching honesty and vulnerability, he has sparked conversations and ignited a movement—one rooted in compassion and solidarity.
But Mo’s impact extends far beyond the realm of advocacy; it resonates deeply within the realm of technological innovation. The emergence of the Hero Gauntlet represents not just a breakthrough in prosthetic design but a symbol of the limitless potential of technology to transform lives.
With each new advancement in prosthetics, the horizon of possibility expands, offering hope to individuals like Mo who once believed their dreams were out of reach. From 3D printing to advanced sensor technology, the future of prosthetics holds boundless promise, promising to revolutionize the lives of individuals with disabilities around the world.
As we look ahead to the future, the significance of Mo’s journey becomes clear—it serves as a roadmap for progress, guiding us towards a world where disability is not a barrier but a source of strength and resilience. Through his courage and determination, Mo Ali has paved the way for a brighter, more inclusive future—one where every individual has the opportunity to thrive, regardless of the challenges they may face.
Tips for Embracing Assistive Technology
1. Research and Consultation:
- Before diving into the world of assistive technology, research and explore the available options. Research different devices, their features, and their compatibility with your specific needs.
- Seek professional guidance from healthcare providers, prosthetists, or occupational therapists who specialize in assistive technology. They can offer valuable insights and recommendations based on your individual circumstances.
2. Comfort and Fit:
- Pay close attention to the comfort and fit of any assistive technology device you consider. A proper fit is essential for optimal functionality and user experience.
- Work closely with professionals to ensure that the device is tailored to your unique anatomy and preferences. Don’t hesitate to request adjustments or modifications to enhance comfort and usability.
3. Trial and Adjustment:
- Understand that adjusting to new assistive technology may take time. Be patient with yourself during the learning process and allow for trial and error.
- Communicate openly with your healthcare providers about any challenges or concerns you encounter. They can offer guidance and support as you navigate the adjustment period.
- Take advantage of any training or educational resources provided to help you become proficient with your assistive technology device.
4. Community Support:
- Connect with support groups and communities of individuals who use similar assistive technology devices. Sharing experiences and resources with others can provide valuable insights and emotional support.
- Online forums, social media groups, and local support organizations are excellent resources for connecting with others who understand the unique challenges and triumphs associated with assistive technology.
5. Celebrating Achievements:
- Remember to celebrate your progress and accomplishments, no matter how small they may seem. Each milestone represents a step forward on your journey towards greater independence and empowerment.
- Keep a journal or record of your achievements to reflect on how far you’ve come. Recognize and celebrate the resilience and determination it takes to embrace assistive technology and navigate life with a disability.
Empowering Possibilities
Mo Ali’s journey from adversity to empowerment stands as a testament to the transformative power of technology and the resilience of the human spirit. Through the remarkable innovation of the Hero Gauntlet, Mo transcended the limitations imposed by his disability, reclaiming his independence and reshaping his destiny.
From the depths of despair emerged a beacon of hope—a story of triumph against all odds. With each movement of his bionic fingers, Mo defied expectations and shattered stereotypes, proving that disability is not a barrier but a springboard for greatness.
As we reflect on Mo’s extraordinary journey, let us not only marvel at his resilience but also recognize the broader implications of his story. The Hero Gauntlet is more than just a prosthetic hand; it is a symbol of possibility—a reminder that with determination and innovation, anything is achievable.
So, dear reader, I urge you to embrace the technological innovations that surround us. Whether you face challenges of your own or simply seek to push the boundaries of what is possible, let Mo’s story inspire you to seize every opportunity for personal growth and empowerment.
In a world filled with endless possibilities, let us dare to dream, innovate, and forge our own paths towards a brighter, more inclusive future. Together, we can harness the power of technology to overcome obstacles, defy expectations, and unlock the boundless potential that lies within each of us.

author: world today news
title: Fertility Crisis: 40 Million Tons of Grain Lost
text:
Argentina Crop Nutrition Crisis: Millions of Tons Lost Annually BUENOS AIRES — May 9, 2024 — A crisis is unfolding in Argentina as the agricultural sector grapples with significant crop losses due to inefficient fertilization practices. The primary issue is inefficiencies, according to experts who cite a lack of proper soil diagnosis which impacts yields, and leads to a loss of millions of tons of grains annually. Addressing soil management is key; read on.
Argentina Grapples With Crop Nutrition Crisis: millions of Tons Lost Annually rosario, Argentina – A stark assessment presented at the Fertilizad 2025 symposium has revealed that Argentina’s agricultural sector is losing approximately 40 million tons of grains annually due to inefficient fertilization practices.Despite increased fertilizer usage, critical gaps in soil management and nutrient investment continue to plague the nation’s crop yields.
The Root of the Problem: Lack of Soil Diagnosis The symposium,organized by the Fertilizar association,highlighted that inadequate soil diagnosis and insufficient investment in essential nutrients are primary drivers of poor crop nutrition. Roberto Rotandaro,president of Fertilizar AC ,emphasized the urgency of addressing these issues,stating that crop nutrition will be key in the next campaign.
Did you know? Only 21% of agricultural operations in Argentina conduct nutrient analysis on their soils. This lack of data hinders effective fertilization strategies. Economic Impact and Lost Potential The consequences of poor fertilization extend beyond crop yields, significantly impacting the Argentine economy. Rotandaro pointed out that around 40 million tons of grains ceased to occur due to inefficiency in fertilization. This represents a ample loss of potential revenue and underscores the need for improved soil management practices.
Key Deficiencies and Opportunities for Enhancement Sulfur Deficiency: Rotandaro noted that the average dose of sulfur today remains just 2 to 3 kilos per hectare. He stressed that sulfur is an economic and efficient nutrient and that increasing its application presents a meaningful prospect for improvement. Corn Production: Gaps in nutrient application are particularly pronounced in corn crops, highlighting the need for targeted fertilization strategies. Pro Tip: Conduct regular soil testing to determine specific nutrient deficiencies. Tailor your fertilization plan based on these results to maximize crop yield and minimize waste. Fertilizer Market Dynamics Argentina’s fertilizer market relies heavily on imports. Rotandaro explained that the country produces a third of the fertilizer that it uses, and the rest is mainly imported from North Africa, the United States, Morocco and Russia. The majority of these imports enter through the port of San Nicolás, followed by San Lorenzo and Rosario.
The Role of Advisors and Thorough Soil Management Rotandaro emphasized the critical role of agricultural advisors in disseminating knowledge and promoting effective soil management. He stated that the advisor has to filter and hierarchize the most relevant technologies, based on diagnosis and understand the diversity of the Argentine producer. He also cautioned against focusing solely on nitrogen and phosphorus, urging a broader outlook that includes addressing issues like water and wind erosion, compaction, and flooding. Not everything is nitrogen and phosphorus. We must also talk about water and wind erosion, compaction, floods. Some problems seem from the past, but remain in force he warned.
reader question: What are the long-term environmental impacts of over-fertilization, and how can these be mitigated? Growth in Biofertilizers and Biostimulants The symposium also highlighted the increasing adoption of biofertilizers and biostimulants in Argentina. Rotandaro noted the strong growth of biofertilizers, which increased their use 25 times in 5 years, and bio -stimulants, by 8. this trend reflects a growing interest in enduring and environmentally friendly agricultural practices.
Call to Action: A Comprehensive Approach The overarching message from the Fertilizad 2025 symposium is the urgent need for a more comprehensive and efficient approach in soil management. rotandaro concluded by reiterating Fertilizar AC’s mission: Disseminating knowledge about nutrition and soil care for sustainable production. That is what moves us every day.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) What is the main cause of grain loss in Argentina? Inefficient fertilization practices, stemming from a lack of soil diagnosis and insufficient nutrient investment. How much grain is lost annually due to this inefficiency? Approximately 40 million tons. What percentage of Argentine farmers conduct soil nutrient analysis? Only 21%. What is Fertilizar AC’s mission? To disseminate knowledge about nutrition and soil care for sustainable production.

author: Shahida Arabi
title: 10 TV Shows About Narcissists and Psychopaths That Will Leave You Breathless
text:
Some television series capture narcissism and psychopathy so well they leave us breathlessly captivated – revealing the ruthless pursuit of power at all costs, predators who are wolves in sheep’s clothing, and cunning manipulators who hide behind masks. While narcissism involves a lack of empathy, a grandiose sense of self and an excessive sense of entitlement, psychopathy goes further, yielding a lack of remorse and even at times sadistic violence. Here are the ten television shows you should watch if you want to see the traits and behaviors of narcissism and psychopathy fleshed out mesmerizingly on screen. Game of Thrones The race for power in Game of Thrones brought all the narcissists to the Westeros yard. Based on George R.R. Martin’s captivating fantasy novels, A Song of Ice and Fire , this HBO drama series adapted for the screen by David Benioff and D. B. Weiss received record-breaking views over the span of its eight seasons, following a war for the Iron Throne of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros. Whether it’s the psychopathic Cersei Lannister plotting and scheming to kill people to secure her power in the North (including her own daughter-in-law, Margaery Tyrell) and beheading people like Missandei in front of her beloved friend Daenerys or the cruel Ramsay Bolton who rapes Sansa Stark and forces her brother’s friend Theon to watch, there is no shortage of sadistic psychopathic and narcissistic traits and actions displayed in the characters in the pursuit of power. Even the ones who are targeted – such as powerful characters like Arya Stark and Daenerys who fight back due to the traumas they have experienced – also engage in violence because they have been harmed by predators throughout their lives, albeit to a different extent.
House of Cards In House of Cards, Frank Underwood is a ruthless psychopathic politician who weaponizes deception and murder to rise in the ranks from the United States House of Representatives all the way to U.S president. Underwood manipulates and deceives many people including his own friends, and even signs off on the deaths of his employees. House of Cards is a chilling portrait of a Machiavellian psychopath who is willing to do anything for power. Ironically, Kevin Spacey, who played Frank Underwood is said to be the real-life Frank as he has been accused of sexual assault by four different accusers and conspiracy theorists have suggested he may be possibly involved in the mysterious crimes involving his accusers.
Succession The critically acclaimed television HBO series Succession follows media mogul Logan Roy, the founder of a multi-billion dollar company and his adult children Shiv, Roman, and Kendall, all of whom manipulate others to rise to corporate power. Whether it is Logan sadistically pitting his own children against each other, promising them positions at his company or his son Kendall Roy making false promises to others to get the upperhand in deals, or his daughter Shiv Roy sabotaging her own husband Tom Wambsgans and setting him up to fail to establish a closer relationship with her father, the show runs rampant with scheming narcissists and psychopaths who plot to maintain the upper-hand.
Breaking Bad The crime drama series Breaking Bad tracks the trajectory of the infamous Walter White, a former chemist who starts using his skills to manufacture and sell meth to gain financial security for his family when he is diagnosed with a life-threatening condition. Walter becomes more and more ruthless as he rises to the top, becoming one of the most dangerous drug lords of the Southwestern drug trade and adopting a new alias, “Heisenberg.” Breaking Bad highlights the grandiosity of narcissism and the lack of empathy as murder and lying become second nature to Walter and he begins blaming others for his own faults and betraying his loved ones, losing sight of the initial intention of getting into this seedy business. His narcissism becomes more blatant throughout the show but some psychologists have suggested these traits were present from the beginning and were only exacerbated over time by his circumstances.
“Who are you talking to right now? Who is it you think you see? Do you know how much I make a year? I mean, even if I told you, you wouldn’t believe it. Do you know what would happen if I suddenly decided to stop going into work? A business big enough that it could be listed on the NASDAQ goes belly up. Disappears. It ceases to exist without me. No, you clearly don’t know who you’re talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!” – Walter White’s grandiose speech to his wife Skylar Law and Order: SVU Law and Order: SVU spans over 23 seasons, bursting with episodes featuring predatory narcissists and psychopaths. This is one of the few shows where victims often get justice and perpetrators get held accountable. Many fans find comfort in empathic detective Olivia Benson reminding many victims it was not their fault, as well as in the show’s resident psychologist, Dr. George Huang, skillfully diagnosing the perpetrators as narcissists and psychopaths. Some notable episodes exploring malignant narcissism and gaslighting include: Born Psychopath and its sequel Post-Graduate Psychopath, Behave, Motherly Love, Annihilated, Doubt, and Surrender Benson.
Dexter Dexter Morgan is a blood spatter analyst by day and a serial killer of serial killers and rapists by night. The quintessential “sympathetic” vigilante psychopath, Dexter still exhibits many disturbing psychopathic qualities like the ability to lie seamlessly, cruelty to animals at a young age, cheat on his partners, and his ability to take sadistic pleasure and show no remorse in murdering predators. He has an elaborate ritual for killing which ensures he leaves no trace, and is cool under pressure (usually), which makes him your friendly neighborhood psychopath. However, unlike most psychopaths depicted on television, some viewers are tempted to see him as working for the greater good.
Criminal Minds If you want to play “spot the psychopath,” no better show allows you to do so than Criminal Minds. A crime drama that follows the FBI profilers of the Behavioral Analysis Unit, the show masterfully examines the personalities and motives of serial predators who commit horrific crimes. The skill set and empathy of FBI profilers like genius Spencer Reid and Special Agent Rossi contrasts the horrific cruelty of the violent criminals they hunt down, making for a riveting yet dark show.
Pretty Little Liars A fan favorite of millennials growing up, Pretty Little Liars is a teen mystery series that highlights the narcissistic and psychopathic traits and behaviors of its female characters specifically. Whether it’s “Queen Bee” Alison DiLaurentis who uses relational aggression to pit her friends against one another and maintain status, or the genius Mona who orchestrates the downfall of her friends through elaborate means – or the mysterious, murderous “A” character who always seems to be in the corner stalking their every move, Pretty Little Liars is filled with suspense and drama that will keep you on your toes.
Mad Men With the backdrop of 1960’s rampant misogyny and aggression toward women, Mad Men is filled with plenty of narcissistic people to choose from – just take your pick of cigar-smoking, wife-beating men. From the pathological liar and serial cheater Don Draper who uses his charming false mask and success as an advertising executive to escape accountability to the narcissistic rapist Greg Harris who forces himself on his girlfriend Joan, viewers will be sucked into a world where narcissists seem to reign in positions of power, and only face consequences at the very end.
Veronica Mars Moonlighting as a private investigator under her detective father’s wing, Veronica Mars is a murder mystery series about a charismatic high school student in the fictional town of Neptune who, with the help of her friends Mac, Wallace, Logan and Weevil, solves numerous mysteries. Yet the largest two unsolved mysteries throughout the series remain who killed her best friend Lilly and who drug-raped her at a party. As Veronica enters a world of manipulators, criminals, and shady characters, viewers are captivated by the long-lasting “whodunnit” and the personal growth and relationships of the rambunctious P.I.

author: sina.com.cn
title: 辽宁自贸试验区深耕八年见"丰景"|辽宁省_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
转自：辽宁日报
本报讯 记者董翰博报道 一片改革开放“试验田”经过精心耕作、悉心管护，正在收获累累果实，培育“良种”的经验也在向更大范围推广。辽宁自贸试验区建设运营8年来，实际利用外资累计50亿美元，外贸进出口额突破1万亿元。2024年，28项创新经验在全省复制推广，其中1项创新经验在全国复制推广；外贸进出口额达1543.7亿元，同比增长22%，其中通过制度创新推动外贸新增量达230亿元。
建设自由贸易试验区是党中央在新时代推进改革开放的重要战略举措。2017年4月辽宁自贸试验区揭牌成立至今，建设运营已有8年。这一平台在制度创新方面探索了哪些新途径、积累了哪些新经验？经营主体有何获得感？4月16日，省商务厅及辽宁自贸试验区沈阳片区、大连片区、营口片区的相关负责人在省政府新闻办召开的新闻发布会上对社会普遍关注的问题作介绍、解答。
省商务厅相关负责人表示，8年来，全省上下全面落实党中央、国务院关于自贸试验区建设的战略部署，推动自贸试验区提质增效，以制度创新为核心，立足创新推动制度型开放、创新带动外贸高质量增长、创新推动全产业链发展、创新推动区域联动发展四方面重点，各项工作取得积极成果。
自贸试验区是深层次改革的排头兵、高水平开放的引领者。8年来，我省坚持创新推动制度型开放。在参与国内、国际标准制定方面，2024年辽宁自贸试验区积极对接国际高标准，共计推出4项改革创新经验在全省复制推广。
贸易便利化是自贸试验区的发力重点。我省进行一系列探索，创新带动外贸高质量增长。比如，我省推出中欧班列综保区前站式集拼、中欧班列“多点集发”海关监管等系列创新模式。2024年，中欧班列进出口货值16.8亿元，同比增长13%。开展跨境电商零售进口“便捷监管”、跨境出口商品清单布控自动分拣等模式。2024年，辽宁自贸试验区跨境电商进出口额达68.1亿元，同比增长39.8%。
推动产业高质量发展是自贸试验区制度创新的重要目标。多年来，辽宁自贸试验区一直在围绕重点产业培育加强部署，创新推动全产业链发展。经过8年的开拓创新，辽宁自贸试验区初步构建了以汽车及零部件、航空装备、生物可降解材料等主导产业为支撑的产业体系。2024年，辽宁自贸试验区工业产值达1315亿元。沈阳片区形成了央地合作打造航空产业集群等多项创新成果，聚集了沈飞民机、南航沈阳维修基地等30余家航空制造与维修的骨干企业。大连片区形成了进出口车辆运输降本增效工作新举措等多项创新成果，聚集了东风日产、奇瑞汽车两大整车厂以及一批汽车零部件配套企业。营口片区形成了科技创新型企业“靶向培育”新机制等多项创新成果，聚集了东盛集团等规模以上新材料企业30家。
自贸试验区联动发展是统筹深层次改革和高水平开放的内在要求。“2024年以来，我省持续强化自贸试验区与重点产业园区联动创新发展，成果不断涌现。”省商务厅相关负责人举例，沈阳片区与大连片区联合试点进口食品《入境货物检验检疫证明》（以下简称《证明》）电子化互认，解决了企业往返海关开具纸质《证明》等问题，截至2024年年底，共签发《证明》2.8万份、食品《证明》近2万份，为企业节省了大量运营成本。
省商务厅相关负责人表示，今年辽宁自贸试验区将深入实施自贸试验区提升战略，更好发挥辽宁自贸试验区示范引领作用。谋划制定辽宁自贸试验区提升战略实施方案或重点任务清单，积极推进大连片区整合提升；开展首创性、集成式探索，持续推动沈阳片区开展飞机保税维修业务，促进国际艺术品产业创新发展，深化大连片区大宗商品贸易制度创新，建立出口汽车“出厂即入港、入港即退税、报备即出口”物流新模式，支持营口片区陆港枢纽产业园、绿色包装产业园建设。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance
